it.polimi.se2019.card.weapon

Class WeaponCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.card.Card
      • it.polimi.se2019.card.weapon.WeaponCard

  • public class WeaponCard
extends Card
    defines the characteristics of a weaponcard, including the use mode, the cost, its effects and two boolean values that indicates when the card is load and used
